biotools.summary: anexVis is a transcriptome tool to visualize organ/tissue-specific glycosaminoglycan biosynthetic and catabolic pathways in human health and diseases. anexVis  allows one to analyze a large number of genes that are related to biosynthetic and catabolic pathways of all glycosaminoglycans, such as heparan sulfate, chondroitin sulfate, keratan sulfate, and hyaluronic acid, in parallel across various human tissues organs. Such visual analyses have not been accessible to the broad research community despite the accumulation of a large amount of RNA-seq data.
